/usr/bin/c++    -g -O3 -std=c++11     CMakeFiles/kfusion-main-opencl.dir/src/mainQt.cpp.o CMakeFiles/kfusion-main-opencl.dir/src/PowerMonitor.cpp.o CMakeFiles/kfusion-main-opencl.dir/src/reader.cpp.o  -o kfusion-main-opencl -rdynamic libkfusion-opencl.a -lglut -lXmu -lXi -lGLU -lGL -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext -lrt -lstdc++ -lpthread -lGL /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libOpenCL.so -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/cuda/lib64
